section.p1: Get a unique smart business card with a fully custom design that contains everything you and your future clients need. Your profile will always be up to date and easily accessible, giving clients instant access to key information and contacts.
section.p2Suffix: you can easily share all your contact details, links to social media, websites, and much more! Stay connected in the modern digital world.

features.description1: With NinjaCard's NFC digital business card, sharing your contacts is seamless. Just tap your NinjaCard NFC card to another NFC-enabled device, and your digital profile will be shared instantly.
features.description2: Each NinjaCard NFC digital business card has a powerful tool for generating new contacts via the 'Swap Contacts' button. This feature allows you to easily capture new contacts, making it the perfect tool for expanding your network.
features.mainHeader3: Update Your Information in Real Time
features.description3: With NinjaCard, you can update your contact information at any time, ensuring that your network always has the most up-to-date information. Just tap your phone to share the updated profile instantly.
features.description4: The Ninja card offers the ability to download a QR code for your smart business card, allowing easy sharing and accessibility of your information. This feature streamlines the process of clients and users accessing your information and provides a seamless user experience.
features.description5: Your smart business card profile offers customization options that allow you to change colors. This flexibility ensures that your business card reflects your brand identity and stands out from the rest. With Ninja Cards, you can create a unique and professional profile for your business card.
features.description6:
Track the performance of your NinjaCard in real time! Get detailed statistics on profile visits, contact downloads, and client engagement.
See how many people have viewed your profile, downloaded your contacts, or clicked on your social media links. With NinjaCard's analytics, you're always informed and can improve the effectiveness of your digital business card.

items.question: What is an NFC Card?
items.answer: An NFC (Near Field Communication) card is a smart card that interacts with NFC-enabled devices, such as smartphones. Simply tap your Ninja NFC card to a phone to instantly share your contact details, social profiles or other digital content.

items.question: How do I use my Ninja NFC Card?
items.answer: Tap your Ninja NFC card to any NFC-enabled device and your personalized profile or info will be shared instantly. No app installation required!

items.question: Can I customize my Ninja NFC Card?
items.answer: Absolutely. Choose from a variety of designs or upload your own so your card matches your brand and style.

items.question: How do I update the information on my Ninja NFC Card?
items.answer: Use our online portal: log in, make your changes and your card will reflect them immediately.

items.question: Are my data safe with Ninja NFC cards?
items.answer: Yes. The card itself stores no personal data; it only triggers a redirect to a secure URL where your information is hosted.

items.question: Do Ninja NFC cards work on all phones?
items.answer: They work with most modern smartphones supporting NFC, including iPhone (7 and newer) and most Android devices.

items.question: What are the benefits of smart business cards?
items.answer: Efficient networking, eco-friendly reusability, and full customization to your brand.

items.question: How do I get started with Ninja Cards products?
items.answer: Program smart cards via our platform. NFC stickers can be applied to surfaces and lead to any action/link you configure.

items.question: How does the Google Reviews integration work?
items.answer: With a tap, customers are sent directly to your Google review page, making it quick and frictionless to leave feedback.

items.question: How can I use NFC stickers in my business?
items.answer: Place them on products, storefronts, POS terminals or marketing materials for instant access to your site, menu, contacts, etc.

items.question: What functions can I customize on the NFC stickers?
items.answer: Configure them to open specific pages, show contact cards or deep-link to review pages (e.g., Google).

items.question: What customization options do you offer?
items.answer: Design, materials and functionality ‚Äî tailored to your needs and visual identity.

items.question: Can I place a bulk order?
items.answer: Yes, we support corporate/bulk orders for teams and events.

items.question: How secure are Ninja Cards products?
items.answer: We follow strong security practices and don‚Äôt store sensitive data on the card itself.

items.question: Can an NFC card be compromised?
items.answer: Since the card holds no personal data and only triggers a secure URL, risk is minimized.

items.question: Can I track interactions with my NFC products?
items.answer: Yes, our analytics show profile views, contact downloads, clicks and more.

items.question: How does the data tracking work?
items.answer: Through the analytics portal you‚Äôll see usage frequency and key performance metrics.

items.question: Do Ninja Cards NFC products work worldwide?
items.answer: Yes, NFC standards are global, so products work internationally.

items.question: Are there country-specific limitations?
items.answer: No specific geographic restrictions as long as the device supports NFC.

items.question: How durable are the smart business cards?
items.answer: They‚Äôre designed to be sturdy and wear-resistant for long-term use.

items.question: Can I wash the NFC stickers?
items.answer: Yes, they‚Äôre water-resistant and withstand contact with water without losing functionality.

howToUse.title: How to use our NFC Ninja Cards?
howToUse.intro: Discover a new way of sharing your contacts with our NFC Ninja Cards. Here's how it works:

steps.1: Scan your card following the video instructions for a quick setup.
steps.2: Tap your NFC card on a compatible phone and share information in seconds.
steps.3: Create a personalized profile that represents you in a unique way.

howToUse.outro: Your contacts will never look the same. Order your NFC Ninja Cards today and impress at every meeting!

PrivacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicy.intro: This Privacy Policy aims to inform you about what personal data we collect through the website https://www.ninjacardsnfc.com/, how we use, store and protect it, as well as your rights as a data subject.

admin.title: Data Controller:

Freelance ‚Äì Programmer

dataCollected.title: Categories of data we collect:
items: Potential clients' data: name, phone, email, message

legalBasis.title: Legal basis for processing:
legalBasis.content:
The processing is based on:
- Art. 6, para. 1, letter (a) GDPR ‚Äì consent
- Art. 6, para. 1, letter (b) GDPR ‚Äì performance of a contract

purpose.title: Purpose of processing:
items: Production and delivery of personalized NFC business cards
Creation and maintenance of client profiles

storage.title: Data storage:
storage.content: Personal data is stored in a secure database via Railway. Emails are managed through [Gmail or CRM]. Data is kept until the client requests deletion or for up to 12 months after last activity.

recipients.title: Data recipients:
recipients.content: Data is only shared with courier providers (Speedy, Econt) for delivery purposes. It is not provided to third parties for marketing purposes.

rights.title: Your rights:
items: Right to erasure (‚Äúright to be forgotten‚Äù)
Right to lodge a complaint with CPDP (www.cpdp.bg)

contact.title: Contact us:
contact.content: If you have questions about data processing, you can contact us via the contact form or email.

sections.title: Parties to the Agreement:
sections.content: The website is operated by Ivan Ivanov, registered as a freelancer.

sections.title: Service Description:
sections.content: The website offers the creation and sale of personalized NFC business cards, ordered by clients through online forms.

sections.title: Orders and Delivery:
sections.content: Orders are placed by completing the form on the website. Deliveries are made via courier services (Speedy/Econt) with cash on delivery.

sections.title: Prices and Payment:
sections.content: Prices are listed in Bulgarian lev (BGN) including VAT where applicable. Payment is made upon delivery or by an agreed method.

sections.title: Order Cancellation and Returns:
sections.content: The customer has the right to cancel the order within 14 days of receipt, in accordance with the Consumer Protection Act. Personalized products cannot be returned except in cases of proven defects.

sections.title: Limitation of Liability:
sections.content: We are not liable for improper use of the NFC cards by the client.

sections.title: Intellectual Property:
sections.content: All texts, designs, and content on the website are the property of the administrator unless otherwise stated.

sections.title: Amendments:
sections.content: The administrator reserves the right to change these terms without prior notice.

sections.title: Governing Law:
sections.content: These terms are governed by Bulgarian law.
